      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
        Description copied from interface: de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IActionStorageProcessor
        Is called when the file adapter was removed. Used to do some cleanUps (not for deleting files), called in admin mode (publish application or on application delete). On default the {APPGUID} directory in internal/files/ will be removed when the directory is empty.
        Specified by:
        cleanUp in interface de.uplanet.lucy.server.file.action.IActionStorageProcessor
